channel.title: First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Introduction
item.description: First steps Introduction The Connector 365 Mail Sender Plus App allows you to control and use multiple mail sender addresses via an extended mail setup. By default, it is only possible to use a single SMTP sender address per company. The Mail Sender Plus App offers a priority-controlled setup for various scenarios within the sender addresses. It is possible to simply change the address in the dialog or set an address as default per report or customer/vendor.

item.title: Test & Purchase
item.description: Testing and purchasing of the Connector 365 Mail Sender Plus App Here you will find all help and learning resources about testing and purchasing the Connector 365 Mail Sender Plus App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installation of the Connector 365 Mail Sender Plus App Here you will find all help and learning resources about installing the Connector 365 Mail Sender Plus App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.
